title.rendered: Trend Micro Home Network Security Firewall Device – Prevent Privacy Leaks, Parental Controls, Content Filtering, Protects from Hacker Viruses & Malware – 1 Year Security Subscription

content.rendered:
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.
PROTECTS, BLOCKS, MONITORS: Protects Smart Home Devices and prevents your personal and financial data from hacking, phishing, ransomware, viruses and risky remote connections. Blocks dangerous files download and websites browsing. Monitors Wi-Fi and internet network usage and detects threats in real time. A smart internet security and privacy solution for your connected devices.
COMPATABILITY with 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT: Trend Micro offers help if you have any trouble with activation or getting Home Network Security to work with your home router. Compatible with Most Wi-Fi Routers. Visit the Questions & Answers section of this page to find a link to the full list of compatible routers. 2 Year Warranty For Station; Includes 1 Year Security Subscription ($59.95 value)
PARENTAL CONTROLS: Filter content, social media and block inappropriate websites. Set time limits to devices including game consoles and tablets. Limit children’s time online and internet access. Tracks your kid’s network usage.
DEVICE MANAGEMENT: Full control of your network and smart devices. Disconnect unwanted devices from your Wi-Fi network. Block new devices joining your network until you approve them. Instant threat notifications. Review recent events with the timeline. Manage devices from anywhere with iPhone and Android smartphones.
EASY TO INSTALL: Simply plug-and-protect to prevent your smart home and connected devices from being hacked with built this secure home Wi-Fi network and smart firewall device. Download, install, and set up in just 3 easy steps.
